data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rakotonirina, Jean Claude, Fisher, Brian L. (2018): Taxonomic revision of the Malagasy Camponotus subgenus Mayria (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) using qualitative and quantitative morphology. Zootaxa 4438 (1): 1-58, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4438.1.1|312 occurrences
